summary: This document is an email correspondence from Chad Markland, a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade, to an individual named Rich. Markland discusses the need for verification of Rich's identity before processing a request, emphasizing the importance of secure communication.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is communicating with Rich regarding the verification of an email request sent to him.

persons.name: Rich
persons.context: Rich is the recipient of the email who needs to verify his identity for processing a request.

keyFacts: Chad Markland requires a phone call from Rich to verify his identity before processing a request.
The email emphasizes the importance of secure communication and verification protocols.
Chad Markland is a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade.
